body:
The "Identity Politics" category is currently hidden by default, so yes, you have to opt-in to be able to see it.

Luckily, they say that there's a "[category reset](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/66cv/instead-of-simply-uncategorizing-my-guild/licr?context=3)" coming soon (likely tomorrow), and all categories will be turned on for existing users.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
The "Identity Politics" category is currently hidden by default, so yes, you have to opt-in to be able to see it.

Luckily, they say that there's a "category reset" coming soon (likely tomorrow), and all categories will be turned on for existing users.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
